name: Garena Free Fire
description:
Unlimited health: you dont have to worry about your players health now in this mod feature you are provided with unlimited health.

 All character unlocked: all characters in this version are unlocked. You can choose your favourite character and start having an amazing time. 

 No fog: There’s no fog in this game making it easier for everyone to enjoy this incredible game. You don’t have to worry about playing in the cold night time mode. 

 No grass: moreover there’s no grass too. Your player can easily move from one area together and target its enemies. 
 Free Fire mod apk Unlimited Diamonds coins/diamonds: players are also provided with an unlimited amount of coins so that they can buy their own accessories like guns and snipers. They don’t have to worry about their coin limit. 

 Customise character: You can also customise your character according to what you like in your player.
